document.docAuthor: Narayanan, S. Prasanth, Sathrumithra, S., Christopher, G., Thomas, A. P. & Julka, J. M.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the earthworms (Oligochaeta) of Kerala, a constituent of Western Ghats biodiversity hotspot, India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the earthworms (Oligochaeta) of Kerala, a constituent of Western Ghats biodiversity hotspot, India

subSubSection.paragraph:
T . Taliparamba
( 12.037ºN , 75.359o E ), India
.
D. Dist. Kannur : Taliparamba ( Stephenson, 1925 ); Kerala endemic.
R. Only
known from the original description.

National Park

Mohan et al. 2011

subSubSection.paragraph:
9.
Drawida matthaii Michaelsen, 1910
Drawida matthaii Michaelsen, 1910 : 47
–48.

T. Calicut ( Kozhikode ) ( 11.258o N , 75.780o E )
,
India .
D. Dist
. Kozhikode:
Calicut ( Kozhikode ) ( Michaelsen 1910 ); Kerala endemic.

T. Nilambur
( 11.276o N , 76.225o E ), India
.
D. Dist. Malappuram
: Nilambur ( Bourne 1894 ); Kerala endemic.
R. Only
known from the original description. Blakemore (2007) has located Nilambur in Southeast India while in fact it is in Kerala (Southwest India )
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
T. Parambikulam
( 10.383o N , 76.708o E ), India .
D. Dist. Palakkad
: Parambikulam ( Stephenson 1915 ); Kerala endemic.

National Park
(
Mohan et al. 2011

( 9.58o N , 76.52E ), India .

Nair et al . 2007
), Vembayam ( Aiyer 1929 ); Kerala endemic.

materialsCitation.collectorName: T. Muthukkuzhi & D. Dist. Thiruvananthapuram & R. Only

paragraph.materialsCitation:
T. Muthukkuzhi
(somewhere in Kerala-Tamil Nadu border), India .
D. Dist. Thiruvananthapuram
: Muthukkuzhi ( Gates 1940 ); Kerala endemic.

known from the original description.
